long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AddUp turns one's browsing experience into a donation machine. After the extension is installed, AddUp inserts an advertisement on every new page visited. The small but frequent ad revenue generated is wired directly to a community-voted ‘charity of the month’. With AddUp, you don’t need deep pockets or a megaphone to make a difference.
